CustomField.description: Defines the retention period for inbound requests in days. This setting determines how long inbound request records will be retained in the system before being automatically deleted. Note that a value of '0' or any negative number will be considered as unlimited retention, preventing automatic deletion of inbound requests.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of days to retain logs. A value of '0' or any negative number means unlimited retention.
CustomField.label: Inbound requests retention period
